this_title: The Beatles: Get Back - The Rooftop Concert
trans_title: 披头士乐队：回归 - 屋顶演唱会
IMAX: The Beatles: Get Back - The Rooftop Concert
introduction: 1969年1月30日，披头士乐队在苹果公司萨维尔街总部屋顶举行了一场令人难忘的音乐会，这场音乐会将作为60分钟特辑在2022年1月30日的IMAX®独家活动和电影制作人问答中放映。这场音乐会以彼得·杰克逊（Peter Jackson）的原创纪录片《披头士乐队：回归》（The Beatles: Get Back，2021）为基础，针对IMAX屏幕进行了优化，采用专有的IMAX DMR®（数字重放）技术将其数字重放到IMAX Experience®的图像和音质中。之后，时长60分钟的《披头士乐队：回归 - 屋顶演唱会》将于2022年2月11日至13日在全球上演。The Beatles' unforgettable concert on the rooftop of Apple Corps' Savile Row headquarters on January 30, 1969, as a 60-minute feature at an Exclusive IMAX® Event Screening and Filmmaker Q&A on January 30, 2022. To celebrate the anniversary of the landmark performance, select IMAX® theaters host the screenings with a filmmaker Q&A, broadcast via satellite simultaneously to all connected IMAX locations. The concert, which features in its entirety in Peter Jackson's original docuseries The Beatles: Get Back (2021), is presented optimized for IMAX screens, digitally remastered into the image and sound quality of The IMAX Experience® with proprietary IMAX DMR® (Digital Remastering) technology. A global theatrical engagement of the 60-minute feature, "The Beatles: Get Back-The Rooftop Concert," will then run February 11-13, 2022.
chinese_title: 披头士乐队：回归 - 屋顶演唱会
foreign_title: The Beatles: Get Back - The Rooftop Concert
